price: 8. Nabii Muusa: sin kee baaxô bagul tanim inkih Yallal koroosittaanamah tu kaak makaltan, toysa diggah Yalli isi ginok gaddali, usuk kulli caalatal faylali kinni keenik iyye.
arabic: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِن تَكۡفُرُوٓاْ أَنتُمۡ وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ حَمِيدٌ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla mūsā in takfurū antum waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan fa-inna al-laha laghaniyyun ḥamīdun
